Good tactical shooters but the abundance of hackers makes it insanely stupid
Somehow the best and worst game all at the same time.

[b]> launch csgo
> load csgo
> launch workshop warmup
> warmup my aim for 10 mins
> finish warmup
> invite friend to lobby
> queue comp
> accepted a match
> annihilates every single being in warmup
> find out 3/4 of my team speak a foreign dialect and have only 100+ hours
> i tryhard for the first half, topfrag, score is 4:0 ("we got this, don't worry")
> enemy comes back and win with the score being 6:9..
> being the only person who deranks from gold nova 2 - gold nova 1 - silver elite master[/b]
